org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.interfaces

Interface MapMarker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICoordinate, MapObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Intersection, MapMarkerCircle, MapMarkerDot, Node, SAVDest, SAVOrigin, SAVZone, Zone

    public interface MapMarker
extends MapObject, ICoordinate
    Interface to be implemented by all one dimensional elements that can be displayed on the map.
    See Also:
    JMapViewer.addMapMarker(MapMarker), JMapViewer.getMapMarkerList()
